legal.purpose:
In this context, we process your personal data exclusively on an anonymous basis in order to enable the following evaluations:

  • - Evaluations of request rates, response times and error rates of the website to find out which pages are most frequently used at what times of the day and where the users are located.
  • - Evaluations of page views and loading performance of the website
  • - Evaluations of the number of users and sessions
  • - Evaluation of user-defined events and metrics

In addition, we process your personal data in connection with the user setting. To improve the user experience, application-specific settings such as the favorite table setting for displaying data are saved.

Furthermore, to support the S&OP process, data records that you have modified or created are stored in SAP.

/D360/DEMAND_VALIDATION.1: Entry overlaps in time with another entry.

/SGD/SCM_SOP.685: {{messageV1}} combinations were selected, a maximum of {{messageV2}} are permitted
/SGD/SCM_SOP.712: Mandatory field (year, currency, customer, pl.lvl.type) missing.

/SGD/SCM_SOP.714: Updates are only allowed in planning currency {{planningCurrency}}.
/SGD/SCM_SOP.715: Planning level {{wrongPlanningLevel}} not allowed. A plan is already existing for {{correctPlanningLevel}}.
/SGD/SCM_SOP.718: An entry is already existing for year {{year}} on level month.
/SGD/SCM_SOP.719: An entry is already existing on level material for year {{year}}.
/SGD/SCM_SOP.720: No authorization for customer {{customer}} and activity {{activity}}

/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.0: Text with the following values could not be found: {{messageV1}}, {{messageV2}}, {{messageV3}}, {{messageV4}}.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.2: Customer material combination does not exist.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.4: Values in the past cannot be saved.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.7: Forecast cannot be saved due to missing authorization.(Code 007)
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.10: Editing/deleting the validated forecast is not possible for this customer.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.16: You do not have the required permissions for the {{messageV1}} customer.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.22: Forecast cannot be saved after the replacement date ({{messageV1}}).
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.23: Phase-Out changed to {{messageV1}} due to Orders / Opportunities.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.26: Delivery plant for follow-up material {{messageV1}} could not be determined.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.27: Circular reference! Successor {{messageV1}} is not allowed!
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.29: Action for copy of forecast not defined.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.30: Changing the portfolio status from {{messageV1}} to {{messageV2}}, is not allowed.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.32: The head of the chain is not the active material
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.33: Combination not created because successor material {{messageV1}} exists.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.34: Circular reference found between material {{messageV1}} and material {{messageV2}}.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.39: Status change to {{messageV1}} is not permitted due to Substitution Type runout without successor!
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.40: Status adjusted to {{messageV1}} due to orders/opportunities.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.41: Status changed to {{messageV1}}, expiry date reached.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.42: Status was set to {{messageV1}}, as no future or historical requirements.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.51: Forecast can not be changed in the past or in the current month.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.52: Forecast can not be changed in the past.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.53: Forecast cannot be distributed due to portfolio status.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.101: A valid region must be passed. {{messageV1}} is not valid.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.103: A successor material must be maintained for the {{messageV1}} substitution type.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.104: The customer number must not be maintained for the {{messageV1}} substitution type.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.105: The sales organization must not be maintained for the {{messageV1}} substitution type.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.106: For the substitution type {{messageV1}} the customer number must be maintained.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.107: Predecessor and successor must have the same 13-digit numbers.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.108: Predecessor and successor must have different 13-digit numbers.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.109: The successor material must not be maintained for the {{messageV1}} substitution type.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.110: For the substitution type {{messageV1}} the predecessor material must be maintained.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.111: The predecessor material must not be maintained for the {{messageV1}} substitution type.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.112: No changes to the already existing data set.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.113: Changing the substitution type is not allowed.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.114: Predecessor {{messageV1}} not in status A in factory {{messageV2}}. Status is {{messageV3}}.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.115: The predecessor {{messageV1}} must have factory {{messageV2}} STOTY = O. STOTY is {{messageV3}}
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.116: The predecessor {{messageV1}} must have in the factory {{messageV2}} STOTY = A. STOTY is {{messageV3}}
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.117: Successor {{messageV1}} is not present in any AP/OP plant of DC group {{messageV2}}.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.118: Successor for {{messageV1}} in plant {{messageV2}} is different in MARC: {{messageV3}}.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.119: The sales area must not be maintained for the {{messageV1}} substitution type.
/SGD/SCM_SOP_SALES.123: SOP date before cutover date is not allowed
